heroDescription: A story of people who plant seeds and tend gardens for the healthy growth of Korea's Ethereum ecosystem, practicing the values of Ethereum.
whoWeAreDescription: <bold>The Ticker is ETH</bold> is a non-profit organization established to help grow Korea's Ethereum ecosystem, inspired by the philosophy of the Ethereum Foundation (EF).
philosophyBox: We don't see Ethereum merely as technology, but as an <accent>Infinite Garden</accent> that anyone can cultivate and grow. We nurture the ecosystem with a gardener's heart.
subtractionDescription: Rather than monopolizing power, we distribute it to the ecosystem. We support communities to create value on their own and build environments that can thrive without us.
stewardshipDescription: We serve as stewards protecting the soul of Ethereum â€” decentralization and openness. We prioritize long-term sustainability over short-term gains.
publicGoodsDescription: We operate solely through grants and donations. No token, no hidden agenda. Pure support for public goods is our only driving force.
poeticQuote: "For an Ethereum forest that will flourish for decades to come, we plant a <seed>small seed</seed>."
